text: 3:9-10 1 Samuel 15:28Ikiavɨra Itir God, Devit bagha Akar Gavgavir mam akɨrigha ghaze, Devit Solɨn adarazi batueghtɨma, me Israelian atrivibar ikian kogham. Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, a uabɨ Devit damightɨ a Israelia ko Judabar atrivimɨn ikɨva, kantrin kam bar a gativagham. Eghtɨ Devit kantrin kamɨn atrivimɨn ikɨ, egh Danɨn anabamɨn nguazimɨn ikegh mangɨ nguibar ekiam Berseban tugham. God Devit bagha dɨkɨrɨzir Akar Gavgavir kam bagh, kɨ Devitɨn akuraghan koghtɨ, God na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremegham.”
